text: Justin du Fresne (died August 25, 2016) was a New Zealand radio broadcaster, known as the Voice of Wellington.Stuff.co.nz: Tributes flow for former Newstalk ZB host Justin du Fresne ‘the voice of Wellington’ | Stuff.co.nz, accessdate: August 27, 2016 He began his career in 1960 working for the New Zealand Broadcasting Service. After a break, he returned to radio in 1984 as a morning talk show host, and retired in 2013. He died from cancer in 2016. ==References== Category:2016 deaths Category:New Zealand radio personalities
title: Justin du Fresne
